name: KERENE
description:
Follow Kerene to the depths of hell!

The deep is a dangerous place, crawling with monsters and traps, you will need to use whatever tools you find to defend yourself, while using your trusty pickaxe to dig your way through.

But be careful! Digging can leave you stranded with no way out!

(You can see controls with the escape key)
